languages.text: "Какая ирония... Великий план Теодоры разрушен ее же наследни{mf|ком|цей}".
"Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."
languages.original_text: "Какая ирония... Великий план Теодоры разрушен ее же наследни{mf|ком|цей}".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."
"Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."
"Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

languages.text: «Oh, qué irónico... El gran plan de Theodora, desbaratado por su propi{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, qué irónico... El gran plan de Theodora, desbaratado por su propi{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: “何等讽刺……西奥多拉的大计，被她的继承人亲手破坏了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: “何等讽刺……西奥多拉的大计，被她的继承人亲手破坏了。”

languages.text: 「あぁ、皮肉なことだ…シオドーラの偉大な計画が彼女の後継者によって阻止された」
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、皮肉なことだ…シオドーラの偉大な計画が彼女の後継者によって阻止された」

languages.text: "Oh, was für eine Ironie ... Theodoras großer Plan ... durchkreuzt von {mf|ihrem eigenen Erben|ihrer eigenen Erbin}.
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, was für eine Ironie ... Theodoras großer Plan ... durchkreuzt von {mf|ihrem eigenen Erben|ihrer eigenen Erbin}.

languages.text: « Quelle ironie... La plus grande machination jamais ourdie par Théodora, déjouée par {mf|son propre héritier|sa propre héritière}. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle ironie... La plus grande machination jamais ourdie par Théodora, déjouée par {mf|son propre héritier|sa propre héritière}. »

languages.text: "Ne ironik... Theodora'nın büyük planını kendi vârisi bozuyor."
languages.original_text: "Oh, the irony... Theodora's great plan, foiled by her own heir."

traits.locale_text: "Ne ironik... Theodora'nın büyük planını kendi vârisi bozuyor."
